description: Fixes their/there/they're confusion when context makes the correct form obvious
spokenText: there going to the store and their going to be late because they forgot there keys over they're
expectedOutput: They're going to the store and they're going to be late because they forgot their keys over there.

description: Fixes your/you're confusion based on grammatical context
spokenText: your going to love this new feature and I think your the best person to review it before its release
expectedOutput: You're going to love this new feature and I think you're the best person to review it before its release.

description: Fixes its/it's confusion distinguishing possessive from contraction
spokenText: its been a long day and the dog lost it's collar but its okay because its not the first time
expectedOutput: It's been a long day and the dog lost its collar but it's okay because it's not the first time.

description: Corrects technical terms commonly misspelled by speech recognition engines
spokenText: we need to update the java script code and fix the type script compiler errors in the web pack config
expectedOutput: We need to update the JavaScript code and fix the TypeScript compiler errors in the Webpack config.

description: Resolves homophones when surrounding context makes the intended word clear
spokenText: I don't know weather we should proceed and witch option is better for the team going forward
expectedOutput: I don't know whether we should proceed and which option is better for the team going forward.

description: Recovers proper nouns mistranscribed as common words when context makes the person clear
spokenText: the report from kneel son shows that ratings dropped and we need to schedule a call with kneel son next week
expectedOutput: The report from Nielsen shows that ratings dropped and we need to schedule a call with Nielsen next week.

description: Preserves ambiguous or uncommon words as-is per rules 12-14 when the correct replacement is uncertain
spokenText: the caulk in the bathroom needs to be replaced and I bought some at the store yesterday
expectedOutput: The caulk in the bathroom needs to be replaced and I bought some at the store yesterday.
